posts.post_content:
Emrakul has protection from colored **spells**, not colors, so there are any number of ways to neutralize this, or steal it from your opponent, or kill it.  
  
[Seasinger](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Seasinger), [Captivating Vampire](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Captivating Vampire), [Cytoplast Manipulator](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cytoplast Manipulator), [Empress Galina](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Empress Galina), [Helm of Possession](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Helm of Possession), [Infernal Denizen](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Infernal Denizen), [Keiga, the Tide Star](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Keiga, the Tide Star), [Memnarch](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Memnarch), [Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker), [Rubinia Soulsinger](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rubinia Soulsinger) or her cousin [Merieke Ri Berit](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Merieke Ri Berit), [Willow Satyr](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Willow Satyr), [Crown of Empires](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Crown of Empires), [Trip Noose](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Trip Noose), [Icy Manipulator](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Icy Manipulator), [Royal Assassin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Royal Assassin), [Amber Prison](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Amber Prison), [Tsabo Tavoc](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tsabo Tavoc), [Aphetto Grifter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Aphetto Grifter), [Attrition](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Attrition), [Diversionary Tactics](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Diversionary Tactics), [Elder Druid/aut](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elder Druid/aut)... Posted By: Tsuichoi (9/24/2011 5:53:57 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
First turn.  
1) Play a [Swamp](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Swamp).  
2) Tap the Swamp for ![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol) to cast the almighty [Dark Ritual](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=54) and get ![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol).  
3) With ![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol) [Entomb](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=30552) Emrakul. Emrakul's triggered ability which forces you to shuffle your graveyard into your library triggers and goes on the stack.  
4) With the remaining ![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol) cast [Shallow Grave](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=3310). It goes on top of the stack, above the triggered ability.  
5) Shallow Grave resolves: Emrakul enters the battlefield with haste.  
6) Emrakul's triggered ability resolves: you shuffle you (empty) graveyard into your library.  
7) Attack to make your opponent start the game at 5 life and eventually annihilate the permanents he or she played during his or her first turn.
posts.html:
First turn.
1) Play a Swamp.
2) Tap the Swamp for to cast the almighty Dark Ritual and get .
3) With Entomb Emrakul. Emrakul's triggered ability which forces you to shuffle your graveyard into your library triggers and goes on the stack.
4) With the remaining cast Shallow Grave. It goes on top of the stack, above the triggered ability.
5) Shallow Grave resolves: Emrakul enters the battlefield with haste.
6) Emrakul's triggered ability resolves: you shuffle you (empty) graveyard into your library.
7) Attack to make your opponent start the game at 5 life and eventually annihilate the permanents he or she played during his or her first turn.

posts.post_content:
So, emrakul turn one IN STANDARD!!! First, you are on the draw. second, you got hit by a goblin guide with put a scalding tarn into your hand. So, draw.  
  
CTangle, Ctangle, CTangle, Ctangle, Lotus cobra, Lotus Cobra, Scalding Tarn, Scalding Tarn, Explore  
  
Reveal all your chancellors, and play your lotus cobras. play and crack scalding tarn, floating two green and getting an island. (4g 1u) Go to (2g 1u) and cast explore, drawing into Time reversal. Play and fetch the other scalding tarn, getting an island, floating (6g 2u) go to (3g) and cast time reversal. draw:  
  
Lotus cobra, explore, scalding tarn, harrow, harrow, harrow, harrow.  
  
Go to (1g) and cast explore. Draw Emrakul. play, crack the tar. Float (5g 1u). (3g, 1u) Play your cobra. go to (1u), cast harrow. Float (6g 1u) Go to (4), cast harrow, (10) go to (7) cast harrow, (13) go to (10), cast harrow, go to (16), cast emrakul, the aeons torn.

Reveal all your chancellors, and play your lotus cobras. play and crack scalding tarn, floating two green and getting an island. (4g 1u) Go to (2g 1u) and cast explore, drawing into Time reversal. Play and fetch the other scalding tarn, getting an island, floating (6g 2u) go to (3g) and cast time reversal. draw:

Lotus cobra, explore, scalding tarn, harrow, harrow, harrow, harrow.

Go to (1g) and cast explore. Draw Emrakul. play, crack the tar. Float (5g 1u). (3g, 1u) Play your cobra. go to (1u), cast harrow. Float (6g 1u) Go to (4), cast harrow, (10) go to (7) cast harrow, (13) go to (10), cast harrow, go to (16), cast emrakul, the aeons torn.

posts.post_content:
How to get Emrakul by turn 3:   
Turn 1: Reveal 4 chancellors of the tangle, play 2 overgrown battlements (you have one more overgrown battlement in your opening hand)  
Turn 2: Draw overgrown battlement. Tap two overgrown battlements to play the other two that you have.  
  
Turn 3: Draw Emrakul, the Aeons Torn. Tap 4 overgrown battlements to play Emrakul, the Aeons Torn.  
Turn 4: Play 2 chancellor of the tangles and attack with emrakul  
Turn 5: play two more chancellors of the tangles and attack again with emrakul  
YOU WIN!!!
posts.html:
How to get Emrakul by turn 3:
Turn 1: Reveal 4 chancellors of the tangle, play 2 overgrown battlements (you have one more overgrown battlement in your opening hand)
Turn 2: Draw overgrown battlement. Tap two overgrown battlements to play the other two that you have.

Turn 3: Draw Emrakul, the Aeons Torn. Tap 4 overgrown battlements to play Emrakul, the Aeons Torn.
Turn 4: Play 2 chancellor of the tangles and attack with emrakul
Turn 5: play two more chancellors of the tangles and attack again with emrakul
YOU WIN!!!
